ing: 1 avocado - peeled, pitted, and cut into 1/2-inch pieces
6 hard-boiled egg whites, chopped into 1/2-inch pieces
2 tablespoons sliced black olives, or to taste
1 pinch ground black pepper to taste
des: "A healthier version of the traditional egg salad. Tastes great by itself or in a whole wheat tortilla wrap!"
ins: Place spinach, avocado, egg whites, and mayonnaise in a large bowl; gently toss to coat. Add celery, olives, lemon juice, salt, and pepper; lightly toss to combine.
